name: Refuse or Refuge
description:
A short visual novel adventure about the consciousness of what we discard. Created for the Pompous Trash Jam in 2021.

Credits: 

Rachel Presser- Story/character concepts, narrative designer

https://sonictoad.com 

Jeremy W. Kaufmann - Character design, environments, 3D Modeling, programming

Tools used: Canva, Paint.net, Adobe Fuse, Medium, and Mixamo by Adobe, Unity, Naninovel

Music:

"Beauty Flow", "Lightless Dawn", "Nowhere Land", "The Way Out", "Tyrant"

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
